Guild Beatdown.name: Guild Beatdown
Guild Beatdown.fullText:
Guildmaster Thief Attack 11Guild Beatdown

You strike your foe, cuing your friend to take a cheap shot.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. If the ally hits and has combat advantage, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 93.
Guild Beatdown.flavor: You strike your foe, cuing your friend to take a cheap shot.
Guild Beatdown.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Guild Beatdown.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. If the ally hits and has combat advantage, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage.

Shifty Direction.name: Shifty Direction
Shifty Direction.fullText:
Guildmaster Thief Utility 12Shifty Direction

With cutthroat timing, you help your ally carefully maneuver.

Encounter        Martial
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 5

Trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is missed by an attack

Target: The triggering ally in the burst

Effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 93.
Shifty Direction.flavor: With cutthroat timing, you help your ally carefully maneuver.
Shifty Direction.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is missed by an attack
Shifty Direction.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Shifty Direction.effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Biting Repositioning.name: Biting Repositioning
Biting Repositioning.fullText:
Guildmaster Thief Attack 20Biting Repositioning

Your attack creates just the right opportunity for you and your crew to back off—or to change the flow of the battle.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Miss: Half damage, and you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 93.
Biting Repositioning.flavor: Your attack creates just the right opportunity for you and your crew to back off—or to change the flow of the battle.
Biting Repositioning.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Biting Repositioning.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Biting Repositioning.onMiss: Half damage, and you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
